allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Vibecode AI System v0.2.0

Features:
- Multi-agent architecture \(API, CLI, Batch, Antigravity agents\)
- Workflow engine with YAML-based workflow definitions
- Smart task routing with confidence scoring
- Context persistence across sessions
- VSCode extension with interactive panel
- Comprehensive unit tests \(101 tests\)

Components:
- agents/: AI agent implementations
- core/: Orchestrator, TaskRouter, WorkflowEngine, ContextManager
- utils/: Cost tracker, Logger
- workflows/: Predefined workflow templates
- tests/: Unit tests with pytest
- vscode-extension/: VS Code integration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Improve VSCode extension output formatting

Changes:
- Add LICENSE file for extension
- Remove icon requirement from package.json
- Improve output formatting in webview panel:
  - Remove ANSI escape codes
  - Remove Rich box drawing characters
  - Clean up emojis and special characters
  - Add styled CSS for results display
  - Format key-value pairs, headers, and lists

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add SESSION-LOG.md for context preservation between agent sessions

Documents completed work on VSCode extension, output formatting fixes,
and provides instructions for resuming development.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
